pr_title: KEYCLOAK-15264 Import realm IGNORE_EXISTING causes NPE

timeline.message: KEYCLOAK-15264 Import realm using directory provider twice with IGNORE_EXISTING will cause NPE for clientId
KEYCLOAK-15264 Import realm using directory provider twice with IGNORE_EXISTING will cause NPE for clientId
KEYCLOAK-15264 Import realm using directory provider twice with IGNORE_EXISTING will cause NPE for clientId

timeline.bodyText: Prefer orElseGet, otherwise the lookup by getClientByClientId is always performed, even when client can be found by id.
timeline.author: hmlnarik
